markdown: Medical and Scientific Communications Plan 2000: Premarin® Family of Products information and take action in a timely fashion to revise inaccurate product information. * Notify major print information sources of new or revised drug information maintaining the confidentiality of our relationship with Wyeth-Ayerst. * Inform commercial information vendors, such as MS, FDB, and the pharmacy management software vendors they support. * Contact the large retail pharmacy chains and inform them of the need to modify information they are providing their patients. * Notify influential agencies, such as the National Council on Patient Information and Education and the FDA, of the need to update incorrect information. * Monitor the quality and timeliness of response by respective information sources. Pharmaceutical Compendia Surveillance Budget Pharmaceutical Compendia Surveillance ... $100,000 18 Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/fpbw0217
